item.description:
Come one, come all.

As another year winds down, what better way to get over the holiday hump than hanging out at Providence's best summer winter bar.

If you haven't been to a meetup, this is your chance to grab a beer or two, meet new people or just introduce yourself.

The Hot Club is classic Providence and should be mandatory for everyone who lives in town.

It's the original waterfront bar with the great beer selection and a grill in the back. It's heated pretty well for the winter.

Chat, feed the jukebox, play bar games or just enjoy the scenic view. It doesn't get easier than that.

Come and go whenever (before 10 of course).

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Post-holiday Hangout at the Hot Club
